about.title: About Comerco
about.subtitle: Comerco Agrotechnology is one of the largest producers of natural and organic fertilizers in Europe with products available worldwide.
about.storyP1: Desertification and soil erosion caused by chemical phenomena have devastating effects on agriculture. Thanks to our research, we created and selected 'smart microbes' that form the basis of biotech solutions.
about.storyP2: Comerco Agrotechnology produces and distributes various lines of biological and natural fertilizers, organic-based fertilizers, hydrolyzed fertilizers and slow-release fertilizers.
about.storyP3: Our company produces and distributes a wide variety of organic fertilizers in liquid and granular form. Our development and research team creates new fertilizer blends for the multiple needs of our customers.
about.microsporeP1: Since 2012, the international marketing and export department SacomHellas - microsporeHellas was established to bring our technology and products in direct contact with the agricultural world of the country.
about.microsporeP2: Microspore headquarters is located in Athens and has international presence through its distributors and customers.
about.missionP1: We have developed and offer innovative and ecologically sustainable biotechnology solutions that are effective both in plant nutrition and environmental recovery.
about.missionP2: The results of our work are: root system development, improvement of plant growth and natural stress resistance, in order to ensure a sustainable future for current and future generations.
about.missionP3: We offer alternative solutions to traditional fertilizers and create added value to make a difference.
about.rdP1: The research and development sector plays a central role in corporate strategy. Microspore has an advanced laboratory and a team of researchers working full-time on projects to develop new fertilizer prototypes, with particular emphasis on organic ones.
about.rdP2: Our innovation and patents relate to fertilizer storage and application methods, microorganism vaccine preparation processes and mycorrhizae production.
about.commitmentP1: Our work is guided by ensuring our products and services are of the highest quality. They are designed to meet our customers' requirements and are based on a clear set of principles including: responsibility, integrity, appearance, durability, inventiveness.
about.commitmentP2: Taking all these aspects into account, we have the ability and desire to offer sustainable solutions to address the major global challenges of our time, particularly resource scarcity, food security and global warming.
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide our every action
about.responsibilityDesc: We are committed to excellent quality in every product and service we offer.
about.integrityDesc: Honest advice, transparent pricing and reliable service. We build relationships based on trust.
about.sustainabilityDesc: We believe in responsible agriculture. Our products support sustainable farming practices.
about.innovationDesc: Continuous innovation and development of new solutions for modern agriculture needs.
about.foundingDesc: The international marketing and export department SacomHellas - microsporeHellas was established
about.expansionDesc: Expansion of distribution network throughout Greece
about.innovationMilestoneDesc: Introduction of new line of biological fertilizers with microorganisms
about.growthDesc: Expansion of biostimulant and organic fertilizer range
about.todayDesc: One of the largest producers of natural and organic fertilizers in Europe

contact.title: Contact

contact.followUsDesc: Stay updated on our new products and latest developments.
